target/
out/
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# === Maven ===
.mvn/
!/.mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar
.mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.properties

# === Gradle ===
.gradle/
build/
!gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar
gradle-app.setting

*.log
*.tmp
*.pid
*.seed
*.orig

.project

.vscode/
